channel.title: CVE Feed for g5theme -- Essential Real Estate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for g5theme -- Essential Real Estate

item.title: CVE-2023-6827|2024-08-02T08:42:07.635Z -- g5theme -- essential%20real%20estate
item.description: The Essential Real Estate plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to insufficient file type validation on the 'ajaxUploadFonts' function in versions up to, and including, 4.3.5. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with subscriber-level capabilities or above, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.

item.title: CVE-2024-4274|2024-08-01T20:33:53.031Z -- g5theme -- essential%20real%20estate
item.description: The Essential Real Estate plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to insufficient validation on the remove_property_attachment_ajax() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to delete arbitrary attachments.

item.title: CVE-2024-4273|2024-08-01T20:33:53.181Z -- g5theme -- essential%20real%20estate
item.description: The Essential Real Estate plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'ere_property_map' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4274|2024-06-04T17:53:25.043Z -- g5theme -- essential%20real%20estate
item.description: The Essential Real Estate plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to insufficient validation on the remove_property_attachment_ajax() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to delete arbitrary attachments.

item.title: CVE-2024-4273|2024-06-04T17:54:37.792Z -- g5theme -- essential%20real%20estate
item.description: The Essential Real Estate plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'ere_property_map' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
